entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
